result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Justin A. Mullen

defendant.name: Mullen, Justin A.
defendant.address: N2140 Spring Lake Rd., Shell Lake, WI 54871

records.addlTxt:
2:15 PM Defendant Justin A. Mullen in court.  Attorney Aaron B Marcoux appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. Court calls case and appearances. Court reviews file. Court questions the defendant. Parties have reached an agreement-State speaks to the court. Defendant entered into a deferred agreement. Court questions the defendant re: waiver of right to an attorney. Set out a review for 1 year. Bond to continue.
Status conference scheduled for August 28, 2023 at 02:00 pm.
Status conference on August 28, 2023 at 02:00 pm.

11:11 AM Defendant Justin A. Mullen in court.  Attorney Aaron B Marcoux in court for State of Wisconsin. Court calls case and appearances. Court questions the defendant re: his right to counsel. Defendant is not eligible for an attorney. Defendant waives reading-Enters a not guilty plea. Bond to continue.
Status conference scheduled for September 19, 2022 at 02:15 pm.
Status conference on September 19, 2022 at 02:15 pm.

1:08 PM Defendant Justin A Mullen in court. Alleged Victim K.M appears in court. ADA Ness appears for the state. Court calls case and appearances. Motion to modify bond-victim requesting the no contact be lifted. State makes statement to the court. No objection to the modification. Court amends bond to no abusive contact w/ conditions.
Bond posted w/ CC in jail

Signature bond of $5000.00. No contact with KLM. Absolute sobriety. Not to enter an establishment that sells alcohol for consumption on premises. Not to consume or possess any alcohol. Not to consume or possess any controlled substances without a prescription by a licensed physician.

1:14 PM ADA Christian Ness appears in person for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Justin A Mullen appeared by video, in custody.  PD Atty Otten appears by video. Court calls case, cites appearances. Court review Probable Cause Statement for JD. Court addresses DE in regards to contact, address and employment. Atty Otten makes statement on representation. ADA Ness makes statement on state's recommendations on bail, Victim is present and wishes to address the court. ADA Ness makes statement, requests Signature bond with conditions along with Embrace assessment. Victim makes statement. Atty Otten makes statement on bond, and DE requested a court appointed attorney. Court imposes $1000 cash bond and $5000 signature bond. Signature bond of $5000.00. No contact with KLM. Absolute sobriety. Not to enter an establishment that sells alcohol for consumption on premises. Not to consume or possess any alcohol. Not to consume or possess any controlled substances without a prescription by a licensed physician.  Return date of 7/11 at 10:00 a.m.  Court will consider modification of bond after completion of Embrace assessment.
Bail/Bond Review scheduled for July 11, 2022 at 10:00 am.
